Software Infrastructure (DevOps)



The projects are related to software management, CI/CD and configuration management automation in S.LSI Division, Samsung Electronics. To acheive the goal, I set up Github and Jenkins for team members and Python virtual environment with Anaconda.

Table of Contents

  • 1. CI/CD Automation
  • 2. Python Virtual Environment
  • 3. DB & Server Monitoring


1. CI/CD Automation


Description

This project has been motivated to manage and automate CI/CD with Github and Jenkins. Github is used for configuration management based on Gitflow, and Github webhook has been used to launch build and deploy when pull request. Blue Ocean has been used for creating pipelines.


Skills

C shell
Jenkins
Blue Ocean
Github


Period

1+ years

  • 1 Jan
    2020

  • Present
    2021

Related Articles



2. Python Virtual Environment


Description

This project has been motivated to develop a documetation and test web page for REST API in a cloud company. To acheive the goal, Sphinx was used to generate Python documentation pages, and statistics and test sections were also added for API monitoring and verfication.

Skills

C shell
Anaconda


Period

1+ years

  • 1 Jan
    2020

  • Present
    2021

Related Articles

  • [Video] Demo



3. DB & Server Monitoring


Description

This project has been motivated to monitor Oracle DB, MongoDB and server . Metrics has been collected with metrics collecter, and Prometheus and Grafana have been used to monitor and visualize data.

Skills

Python
Prometheus
Grafana


Period

1+ months

  • 1 Mar
    2021

  • Present
    2021
